summary: A young man drops out of university and goes to the police. He's done nothing wrong he just wants a job. A particular job. Playing the victim in murder reconstructions. Maybe by getting close to death he can manage to cheat on his own.
cast: Yuriy Chursin|Vitaliy Khaev|Marat Basharov|Olga Demidova|Marina Golub|Anna Mikhalkova|Fyodor Dobronravov|Andrey Fomin|Elena Morozova|Natalya Mokritskaya|Igor Gasparyan|Maksim Konovalov|Aleksey Marchenko|Liya Akhedzhakova|Aleksandr Ilin
title: Izobrazhaya zhertvu
